00014 #ifndef U_MOD_PROXY_SERVICE_H
00015 #define U_MOD_PROXY_SERVICE_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/pcre/pcre.h>
00018 
00019 class UCommand;
00020 class UFileConfig;
00021 
00022 class UModProxyService {
00023 public:
00024 
00025         // Check for memory error
00026         U_MEMORY_TEST
00027 
00028         // Allocator e Deallocator
00029         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00030         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00031 
00032         static UString* str_REPLACE_RESPONSE;
00033         static UString* str_FOLLOW_REDIRECTS;
00034         static UString* str_CLIENT_CERTIFICATE;
00035 
00036         static void str_allocate();
00037 
00038         enum Error {
00039                 INTERNAL_ERROR             = 1, // NB: we need to start from 1 because we use a vector...
00040                 BAD_REQUEST                = 2,
00041                 NOT_FOUND                  = 3,
00042                 FORBIDDEN                  = 4,
00043                 ERROR_PARSE_REQUEST        = 5, // user case start...
00044                 ERROR_A_BAD_HEADER         = 6,
00045                 ERROR_A_X509_MISSING_CRT   = 7,
00046                 ERROR_A_X509_REJECTED      = 8,
00047                 ERROR_A_X509_TAMPERED      = 9,
00048                 ERROR_A_X509_NOBASICAUTH   = 10
00049         };
00050 
00051         // COSTRUTTORI
00052 
00053         UModProxyService()
00054                 {
00055                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UModProxyService, "", 0)
00056 
00057                 if (str_FOLLOW_REDIRECTS == 0) str_allocate();
00058                 }
00059 
00060         ~UModProxyService()
00061                 {
00062                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UModProxyService)
00063                 }
00064 
00065         // VARIE
00066 
00067         int     getPort() const           { return port; }
00068         UString getUser() const           { return user; }
00069         UString getServer() const         { return server; }
00070         UString getPassword() const       { return password; }
00071 
00072         bool isReplaceResponse() const   { return (vreplace_response.empty() == false); }
00073         bool isFollowRedirects() const    { return follow_redirects; }
00074         bool isResponseForClient() const  { return response_client; }
00075         bool isRequestCertificate() const { return request_cert; }
00076 
00077         UString replaceResponse(const UString& msg);
00078 
00079         // SERVICES
00080 
00081         UCommand* command;
00082 
00083         static void                                      setMsgError(int err, UVector<UString>& vmsg_error);
00084         static UModProxyService* findService(const UString& host, const UString& method, UVector<UModProxyService*>& vservice);
00085         static void                                      loadConfig(UFileConfig& cfg, UVector<UModProxyService*>& vservice, UVector<UString>* vmsg_error);
00086 
00087         // DEBUG
00088 
00089 #ifdef DEBUG
00090         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00091 #endif
00092 
00093 protected:
00094    UVector<UString> vreplace_response;
00095         UString host_mask, server, user, password, method_mask;
00096         UPCRE uri_mask;
00097         int port;
00098         bool request_cert, follow_redirects, response_client;
00099 
00100 private:
00101         UModProxyService(const UModProxyService&)            {}
00102         UModProxyService& operator=(const UModProxyService&) { return *this; }
00103 };
